Title: Scream 2
Actors: Jada Pinkett Smith, Omar Epps, Paulette Patterson, Rasila Schroeder
Plot: Two years after the first series of murders, as Sidney acclimates to college life, someone donning the Ghostface costume begins a new string of killings.
Production: Craven-Maddalena Films, Miramax Films, Konrad Pictures, Dimension Films, Maven Entertainment Inc.
